divs: Sighting Detailsaround 10:20 pm we were outside sitting in our pool. we live southeast, just outside of wanamaker, in. we saw first one very bright, unflickering, orange fireball. it looked like it might have been a misfired firework, but it continued east without losing altitude. before this object flew out of sight, another bright orange ball appeared. this one was different though- it headed north, the orange light disappeared and it was just a black object. it went over several houses and i swear it landed on someone's roof or yard. then a few minutes later, a third orange light headed east, then disappeared. there were airplanes in the sky before and after we saw this, and they looked completely different-- i was thinking maybe the air quality or smog was distorting the lights, but that didn't seem to be the case. oh, and there was no noise coming from them, and they all came from the same exact direction in the sky- northwest.
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were no other sightings in Indianapolis on or around July 3rd 2012
